title: BUZZ-U.S. STOCKS ON THE MOVE-Unity Software , Li Auto, Copper Miners
text:
* The Morning News Call newsletter: here U.S. stock index futures fell on Monday, taking cues from global markets, after weak economic data from China rekindled fears of an economic slowdown in the world's second-largest economy.

At 9:15 ET, Dow e-minis were down 0.61% at 33,514. S&P 500 e-minis were down 0.65% at 4,253.25, while Nasdaq 100 e-minis were down 0.43% at 13,519. The top three NYSE percentage gainers premarket: ** Team Inc, up 71.0% ** Regis Corp , up 37.9% ** Ironsource Ltd , up 13.7% The top three NYSE percentage losers premarket: ** Gelesis Holdings Inc , down 22.7% ** Turquoise Hill Resources Ltd , down 17.4% ** Zurn Elkay Water Solutions Corp , down 13.3% The top Nasdaq percentage gainer premarket: ** Plus Therapeutics Inc , up 64.8% ** Turquoise Hill Resources Ltd : down 17.4% premarket BUZZ - Plunges after rejecting Rio Tinto 's buyout offer ** Exxon Mobil Corp: down 3.6% premarket ** Marathon Oil Corp : down 4.3% premarket ** Occidental Petroleum Corp : down 4.2% premarket BUZZ - BUZZ-Energy firms decline as disappointing China data pressures crude

** Barrick Gold Corp : down 2.6% premarket ** Newmont Corp : down 1.8% premarket ** Harmony Gold Mining Company Ltd : down 1.7% premarket ** Gold Fields Ltd : down 2.6% premarket BUZZ - Gold miners fall as firmer dollar, Fed rate-hike fears weigh on bullion

** Plus Therapeutics Inc : up 64.8% premarket BUZZ - Gains on positive cancer drug data

** Li Auto Inc : down 3.7% premarket BUZZ - Falls after wider Q2 loss

** Quantum Corp : up 5.7% premarket BUZZ - Rises after investor PIMCO hikes stake

** PlayAGS Inc : up 11.6% premarket BUZZ - Jumps on confirming buyout proposal from Inspired Entertainment

** First Solar Inc : down 1.2% premarket BUZZ - A key beneficiary of IRA, says Piper Sandler; raises PT

** Bed Bath & Beyond Inc : up 16.4% premarket BUZZ - Highly shorted Bed Bath and Beyond climbs again

** Virgin Orbit Holdings Inc : down 4.4% premarket BUZZ - Falls as Q2 revenue plummets

** Freeport-McMoRan Inc : down 4.5% premarket ** Rio Tinto PLC : down 3.8% premarket ** BHP Group Ltd : down 3.5% premarket ** Teck Resources Ltd : down 3.8% premarket BUZZ - Copper miners track over 2% drop in metal prices on weak China data

** Alibaba.com Ltd : down 1.8% premarket ** JD.com Inc : down 1.4% premarket ** Pinduoduo Inc : down 1.6% premarket ** Baidu Inc : down 1.7% premarket BUZZ - China ADRs slip on slowdown worries, delisting woes

** Genprex Inc : up 6.2% premarket BUZZ - Up as safety panel approves dose escalation in lung cancer study

** Targa Resources Corp down 4.0% premarket BUZZ - J.P. Morgan says Targa outlook attractive on Permian position; raises PT

** Viridian Therapeutics Inc : up 39.0% premarket BUZZ - Soars on eye disease treatment trial data

** Unity Software Inc : down 5.4% premarket BUZZ - Falls after rejecting AppLovin 's $17.5-bln takeover bid

** Agrify Corp : up 7.5% premarket BUZZ - Rises on higher Q2 revenue

** JPMorgan Chase & Co : down 1.0% premarket ** Wells Fargo & Co : down 1.4% premarket ** Morgan Stanley : down 1.3% premarket ** Citigroup Inc : down 0.8% premarket BUZZ - Big banks fall as weak China data re-ignites slowdown fears

** Halozyme Therapeutics Inc : down 1.8% premarket BUZZ - Launches convertible debt deal, shares slip
